titleStmt.title: Articles of agreement already concluded upon, betwixt the Kings Majesty, and his Excellency Sir Thomas Fairfax and the army under his command Expressing their mutual concord for the sudden settlement of peace in his Majesties three kingdoms, England, Scotland and Ireland. Commanded to be forthwith printed and published.
